mapper.select: SELECT ENO , ETYPE , EDATE , EUSER , CONTENT , WRITER , REGDATE FROM MP_EXCEPTION WHERE ENO = #{eno}

SELECT ROWNUM, ENO, ETYPE, EDATE, EUSER, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, A.ENO, A.ETYPE, A.EDATE, A.EUSER, A.CONTENT, A.WRITER, A.REGDATE FROM MP_EXCEPTION A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY ENO DESC ) list WHERE ROWNUM >= #{rowStart} AND ROWNUM <= #{rowEnd} ORDER BY list.ENO DESC

SELECT COUNT(ENO) FROM MP_EXCEPTION WHERE 1=1
AND ENO > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE MP_EXCEPTION SET ETYPE = #{etype}, EDATE = #{edate}, EUSER = #{euser}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer}, REGDATE = NOW() WHERE ENO = #{eno}
